name: Laptop

name: Smartphone
description: Feature-rich smartphone with a 6.2-inch screen, 12MP dual camera, 128GB storage, and a 4000mAh battery.

name: Headphones
description: High-quality wireless headphones with over-ear design, 20 hours of battery life, and a sleek black color.

description: Smartwatch with a 1.3-inch AMOLED display, water-resistant, fitness tracking features,  GPS functionality.

name: Speakers

name: Television
description: Experience stunning visuals and smart functionality with our feature-rich televisions. Elevate your entertainment!
